message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counteroffer at $9500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9000. Can you consider that?
I understand your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm not ready to give up yet. I'll counteroffer at $9750. It's getting close to my minimum, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
